categories: Category:Captains and commanders of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Fovish was a Human female who served as an captain in the Imperial Military of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Galactic War with the Galactic Republic. During the Battle of Ilum, she was stationed in the Imperial base camp.
Fovish first appeared in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic by BioWare as the Specialty Goods vendor on Ilum for the Empire.
